title: JATAYU - Women Safety App
description: A mobile app to enhance women's safety by alerting nearby police of harassment incidents within a 2 km radius. Integrated YOLO for real-time CCTV analysis and enabled location sharing via Firebase.

title: SmartSend - AI-Powered Email Scheduler
description: An AI-based email scheduler app leveraging Googleâ€™s Gemini API for intelligent email generation, with Firebase for authentication and Java Mail API for automation. Implemented MVVM architecture for seamless user experience.

title: Plasma - Confrence Management App
description: A confrence management app for Pandit Deendayal Energy University for Plasma Conference's attendees and organizers, with a responsive UI and backend using FLutter, Firebase & Realtime Scheduling.

title: MedisyncExperience - Healthcare App
description: A healthcare app developed using Java and XML, utilizing SQLite for local storage and MySQL for remote database management. The app allows users to find and schedule appointments with healthcare providers efficiently.

title: Suitain
description: SUSTAIN - Satellite Utilization for Smart Tools in Agriculture and Innovative Networking is an App & Website built for NASA Space App Challange 2024
